author: DistroTube
description:
Debian recently had a new release--version 13 codenamed "Trixie."  Today, I'm going to take a quick installation and first look of Debian 13 inside a virtual machine.

REFERENCED:
► https://www.debian.org/

title: A Quick Look At Debian 13 "Trixie"
